Articles.Content:
![dB0Hbh.png](http://i.imgur.com/dB0Hbh.png)

Well, after about 4 hours of trial and error, I\'ve created a spaceplane which looks like something straight out of Star Trek. 

She\'s a bit touchy on the throttle due to a constant shifting center of gravity after stage I, so just make sure not to throttle it past the controllable limit and make needed use of RCS. 

It is indeed very orbit capable, and upon re-entry is an incredibly maneuverable, stable, jet powered craft with more than enough endurance to get you back home in the event of a bad re-entering.

Special safety features include:

- a detachable, reinforced cockpit module complete with parachute

- Drag chute for precision braking on landing

Enjoy, feedback on improvements are welcome! More photos in the link below!

[http://imgur.com/a/ZpqEQ](http://imgur.com/a/ZpqEQ)
